title: Salmon mousse choux pastries
ingredients: ['150g salmon fillet, skin removed, cut into small pieces', '1 lemon, juiced', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh dill', '150ml milk', '100ml water', '1 pinch salt', '80g butter, cut into pieces', '150g plain flour', '4 eggs', '150g smoked salmon', '150g cream cheese', '350g ricotta cheese']
